name: Drunk Way Home
description:
"I" am too drunk to find my way home. 

Your goal is control "me" walking back home.

Initial control of "me" is W,S,A,D, but control changes over time!

But "my" memory of what "my" home looks like is blocked. 

You can press Tab to check "my" memory of "my" own house. Every time "I" hit something and fall down, I sober up a little bit, so part of my memory will reveal itself.

Walk towards the door and press E to check if it is "my" home! 

All those buildings on the street, which one is "my“ home??

Thanks for playing! Enjoy the game!

Sincerely,

Team 723
